docs.text: that's no doubt -- it seems any movie with critical acclaim makes you think you're going in for the ride of your life , that you'll end up changed on the other side , and you come out of the theater going , " eh . . .

docs.text: * that's * what all the fuss was about ? "

docs.text: so , naturally , the truman show was building up to what was going to be a dissapointment .
docs.label: positive

docs.label: positive

docs.text: the truman show is truly " the film of the decade " and " a breakthrough " and more .

docs.text: and you will come out changed on the other side .

docs.text: such a movie comes around only once in a lifetime , where you find yourself feeling everything that the character is feeling , and this , friends , is it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: jim carrey shows that he doesn't need to talk out of his butt to entertain us ; that he can be as dramatic as any of hollywood's leading men .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the film has a difficult premise to tackle , trying to set us up thirty years into the " truman show's " run , but tackle it it does , and perfectly .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: with flashbacks actually being flashbacks on the television show , you get the sense that you are viewing a * real * prime-time hit .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and the way the camera constantly takes the forms it would in the " real " truman show is clever and well-done .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: people , rejoice !
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this is the first oscar-worthy film of not only this year , but of the last five years .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: not since " schindler's list " has a movie captured human spirit and true despair so well .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this is a classic in the making , and ( to borrow a line from esquire's review ) it stars jim carrey .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: nothing in his career to date and nothing he can do in the future will ever be able to top his role as truman burbank ; mark my word .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: for , as i said , this is the movie of a lifetime and the role is of the same calibre .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: forget special-effect ladden summer fodder .

docs.text: you need nothing more than " the truman show " to carry you through the summer , or for that matter , the year .
